QuestData.Title: First Blood
QuestData.Description: Be prepared, $n. You will cast the first blood upon this land for us.$B$BThe Syndicate, as they call themselves, are cowardly humans who betray even their own kind. Their isolation will make them easy prey.$B$BTravel north, slay any Syndicate members you find, and claim Northfold Manor in the name of the Forsaken. Bring me the Bloodstone Amulets they wear as proof of your conquest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 10 Bloodstone Amulets from members of the Syndicate.
QuestData.CompletionText: I won't be swayed by empty claims. Have you proof of your loyalty?
QuestData.RewardText: This is but a prelude to the slaughter we will visit upon these lands. All will know our name.$B$BYou have done well, $n. Victory for Sylvanas!
